cause.description:
As we all know NYC pretty much dominates the population of NYS. Well, there's no reason that students in the northcountry should be given a sub-par education just because we have a smaller population. Let's bring some money up to the northcountry and get our education systems at least on level with the rest of the state. The only thing I could have money donated to even CLOSE was in Malone. So it'll be staying somewhat local.
1. It's not about the money, it's about the equal rights to a good education.
cause.mission: To get more state funding for the schools of Northern NY so not all the money is going to the City.
cause.name: More Funding to Northern NY Schools
